mapper.sql: id, app_key, day, hour, wsr_query_ald_link_key, wsr_query_ald_media_id, ag_ald_position_id, visitor_count, authuser_count, open_count, total_page_count, new_comer_count, total_stay_time, secondary_avg_stay_time, one_page_count, bounce_rate, new_people_ratio, authuser_people_ratio, update_at
mapper.insert: insert into aldstat_daily_link_monitor (id, app_key, day, hour, wsr_query_ald_link_key, wsr_query_ald_media_id, ag_ald_position_id, visitor_count, authuser_count, open_count, total_page_count, new_comer_count, total_stay_time, secondary_avg_stay_time, one_page_count, bounce_rate, new_people_ratio, authuser_people_ratio, update_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day,jdbcType=DATE}, #{hour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wsrQueryAldLinkKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wsrQueryAldMediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agAldPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authuserCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newComerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalStayTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondaryAvgStayTime,jdbcType=REAL}, #{onePageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bounceRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{newPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, #{authuserPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update aldstat_daily_link_monitor
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
app_key = #{record.appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
day = #{record.day,jdbcType=DATE},
hour = #{record.hour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wsr_query_ald_link_key = #{record.wsrQueryAldLinkKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wsr_query_ald_media_id = #{record.wsrQueryAldMediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ag_ald_position_id = #{record.agAldPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitor_count = #{record.visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
authuser_count = #{record.authuserCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
open_count = #{record.openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_page_count = #{record.totalPageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
new_comer_count = #{record.newComerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_stay_time = #{record.totalStayTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
secondary_avg_stay_time = #{record.secondaryAvgStayTime,jdbcType=REAL},
one_page_count = #{record.onePageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bounce_rate = #{record.bounceRate,jdbcType=REAL},
new_people_ratio = #{record.newPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL},
authuser_people_ratio = #{record.authuserPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL},
update_at = #{record.updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update aldstat_daily_link_monitor set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, app_key = #{record.appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day = #{record.day,jdbcType=DATE}, hour = #{record.hour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsr_query_ald_link_key = #{record.wsrQueryAldLinkKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsr_query_ald_media_id = #{record.wsrQueryAldMediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ag_ald_position_id = #{record.agAldPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitor_count = #{record.visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, authuser_count = #{record.authuserCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_count = #{record.openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_page_count = #{record.totalPageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, new_comer_count = #{record.newComerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_stay_time = #{record.totalStayTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, secondary_avg_stay_time = #{record.secondaryAvgStayTime,jdbcType=REAL}, one_page_count = #{record.onePageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bounce_rate = #{record.bounceRate,jdbcType=REAL}, new_people_ratio = #{record.newPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, authuser_people_ratio = #{record.authuserPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, update_at = #{record.updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select:
SELECT mo.*,ce.link_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where `day`=#{date} and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key != 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id = 'all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key and mo.app_key=ce.app_key where ce.link_name like CONCAT('%',#{activitiesName},'%')
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

select mo.* from (select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where `day`=#{date} and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key != 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id = 'all' and hour!='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key and mo.app_key=ce.app_key where ce.link_name = #{activitiesName} order by mo.hour desc

SELECT mo.*,ce.media_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where `day`=#{date} and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key = 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id != 'all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_media ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=ce.media_id and mo.app_key=ce.app_key where ce.media_name like CONCAT('%',#{channel},'%')
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

SELECT mo.* from (select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where `day`=#{date} and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key = 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id != 'all' and hour!='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_media ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=ce.media_id and mo.app_key=ce.app_key where ce.media_name = #{channel} order by mo.hour desc

select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where `day`=#{date} and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key = 'all' and ag_ald_position_id != 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id = 'all' and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and hour!='all' order by hour desc

SELECT mo.*,ce.link_name,me.media_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where `day`=#{date} and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key != 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id != 'all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key and mo.app_key=ce.app_key INNER JOIN ald_media me on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=me.media_id and mo.app_key=me.app_key where me.media_name like CONCAT('%',#{channel},'%') where ce.link_name like CONCAT('%',#{activitiesName},'%')
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

SELECT ana.open_count AS total,ald.open_count AS extend,ana.open_count-ald.open_count AS naturalquantity FROM (select app_key,SUM(open_count) AS open_count,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all' ) ald INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(open_count) AS open_count,app_key,day FROM aldstat_trend_analysis WHERE day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} ) ana ON ald.app_key=ana.app_key

SELECT ald.day,ana.open_count AS total,ald.open_count AS extend,ana.open_count-ald.open_count AS naturalquantity FROM (select app_key,open_count,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all' ) ald INNER JOIN ( SELECT open_count,app_key,day FROM aldstat_trend_analysis WHERE day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} ) ana ON ald.app_key=ana.app_key and ald.day=ana.day

SELECT ana.visitor_count AS total,ald.visitor_count AS extend,ana.visitor_count-ald.visitor_count AS naturalquantity FROM (select app_key,SUM(visitor_count) AS visitor_count,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all' ) ald INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(visitor_count) AS visitor_count,app_key,day FROM aldstat_trend_analysis WHERE day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} ) ana ON ald.app_key=ana.app_key

SELECT ald.day,ana.visitor_count AS total,ald.visitor_count AS extend,ana.visitor_count-ald.visitor_count AS naturalquantity FROM (select app_key,visitor_count,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all' ) ald INNER JOIN ( SELECT visitor_count,app_key,day FROM aldstat_trend_analysis WHERE day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} ) ana ON ald.app_key=ana.app_key and ald.day=ana.day

SELECT ana.new_comer_count AS total,ald.new_comer_count AS extend,ana.new_comer_count-ald.new_comer_count AS naturalquantity FROM (select app_key,SUM(new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all' ) ald INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,app_key,day FROM aldstat_trend_analysis WHERE day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} ) ana ON ald.app_key=ana.app_key

SELECT ald.day,ana.new_comer_count AS total,ald.new_comer_count AS extend,ana.new_comer_count-ald.new_comer_count AS naturalquantity FROM (select app_key,new_comer_count,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all' ) ald INNER JOIN ( SELECT new_comer_count,app_key,day FROM aldstat_trend_analysis WHERE day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} ) ana ON ald.app_key=ana.app_key and ald.day=ana.day

SELECT ana.authuser_count AS total,ald.authuser_count AS extend,ana.authuser_count-ald.authuser_count AS naturalquantity FROM (select app_key,SUM(authuser_count) AS authuser_count,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all' ) ald INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(authuser_count) AS authuser_count,app_key,day FROM aldstat_trend_analysis WHERE day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} ) ana ON ald.app_key=ana.app_key

SELECT ald.day,ana.authuser_count AS total,ald.authuser_count AS extend,ana.authuser_count-ald.authuser_count AS naturalquantity FROM (select app_key,authuser_count,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all' ) ald INNER JOIN ( SELECT authuser_count,app_key,day FROM aldstat_trend_analysis WHERE day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} ) ana ON ald.app_key=ana.app_key and ald.day=ana.day

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.new_people_ratio) AS new_people_ratio,SUM(mo.authuser_people_ratio) AS authuser_people_ratio,mo.app_key,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,ce.link_name FROM (select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key != 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id = 'all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key where ce.link_name like CONCAT('%',#{activitiesName},'%') group by mo.app_key,mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.day FROM ( select * from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key !='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id='all' and ag_ald_position_id='all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key where ce.link_name = #{activitiesName} group by mo.day order by mo.day desc

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.new_people_ratio) AS new_people_ratio,SUM(mo.authuser_people_ratio) AS authuser_people_ratio,mo.app_key,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,ce.media_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key = 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id != 'all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_media ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=ce.media_id where ce.media_name like CONCAT('%',#{channel},'%') group by mo.app_key,mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.new_people_ratio) AS new_people_ratio,SUM(mo.authuser_people_ratio) AS authuser_people_ratio,mo.app_key,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.day FROM (select * from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key ='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id!='all' and ag_ald_position_id ='all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key where ce.link_name = #{activitiesName} group by mo.day

select SUM(visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(open_count) AS open_count,SUM(new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(new_people_ratio) AS new_people_ratio,SUM(authuser_people_ratio) AS authuser_people_ratio,SUM(total_stay_time)/SUM(total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(one_page_count)/SUM(total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,app_key,ag_ald_position_id FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and wsr_query_ald_link_key = 'all' and ag_ald_position_id != 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id = 'all' and hour='all' group by app_key,mo.ag_ald_position_id
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

select SUM(visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(open_count) AS open_count,SUM(new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(total_stay_time)/SUM(total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,day from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and wsr_query_ald_link_key ='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id ='all' and ag_ald_position_id !='all' and hour ='all' group by mo.day order by mo.day

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.new_people_ratio) AS new_people_ratio,SUM(mo.authuser_people_ratio) AS authuser_people_ratio,mo.app_key,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,ce.link_name,me.media_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key != 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id != 'all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key INNER JOIN ald_media me on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=me.media_id where ce.link_name like CONCAT('%',#{activitiesName},'%') group by mo.app_key,mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key,mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.day FROM ( select * from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key !='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id !='all' and ag_ald_position_id ='all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key INNER JOIN ald_media me on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=me.media_id where me.media_name = #{channel} where ce.link_name = #{activitiesName} group by mo.day order by mo.day

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.new_people_ratio) AS new_people_ratio,SUM(mo.authuser_people_ratio) AS authuser_people_ratio,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.app_key,mo.ag_ald_position_id,ce.link_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and wsr_query_ald_link_key != 'all' and ag_ald_position_id != 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id = 'all' and hour='all' ) mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key where ce.link_name like CONCAT('%',#{activitiesName},'%') group by mo.app_key,mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key,mo.ag_ald_position_id
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.day FROM ( select * from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and wsr_query_ald_link_key !='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id ='all' and ag_ald_position_id !='all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key where ce.link_name = #{activitiesName} group by mo.day order by mo.day desc

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.new_people_ratio) AS new_people_ratio,SUM(mo.authuser_people_ratio) AS authuser_people_ratio,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.app_key,mo.ag_ald_position_id,ce.media_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and wsr_query_ald_link_key = 'all' and ag_ald_position_id != 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id != 'all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_media ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=ce.media_id and ce.media_name like CONCAT('%',#{channel},'%') group by mo.app_key,mo.ag_ald_position_id,mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.day FROM ( select * from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and wsr_query_ald_link_key ='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id !='all' and ag_ald_position_id !='all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_media ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=ce.media_id and ce.media_name = #{channel} group by mo.day order by mo.day desc

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.new_people_ratio) AS new_people_ratio,SUM(mo.authuser_people_ratio) AS authuser_people_ratio,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.app_key,mo.ag_ald_position_id,ce.link_name,me.media_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and wsr_query_ald_link_key != 'all' and ag_ald_position_id != 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id != 'all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key INNER JOIN ald_media me on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=me.media_id where me.media_name like CONCAT('%',#{channel},'%') where ce.link_name like CONCAT('%',#{activitiesName},'%') group by mo.app_key,mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key,mo.ag_ald_position_id,mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id
order by mo.${prop} ${order}

SELECT SUM(mo.visitor_count) AS visitor_count,SUM(mo.authuser_count) AS authuser_count,SUM(mo.open_count) AS open_count,SUM(mo.new_comer_count) AS new_comer_count,SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS total_page_count,SUM(mo.total_stay_time)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS secondary_avg_stay_time,SUM(mo.one_page_count)/SUM(mo.total_page_count) AS bounce_rate,mo.day FROM ( select * from aldstat_daily_link_monitor where day >= str_to_date(#{dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') and day <= str_to_date(#{dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') and app_key=#{appkey} and ag_ald_position_id=#{scene} and wsr_query_ald_link_key !='all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id !='all' and ag_ald_position_id !='all' and hour='all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key INNER JOIN ald_media me on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=me.media_id where me.media_name = #{channel} where ce.link_name = #{activitiesName} group by mo.day order by mo.day desc
mapper.update:
update aldstat_daily_link_monitor
app_key = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
day = #{day,jdbcType=DATE},
hour = #{hour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wsr_query_ald_link_key = #{wsrQueryAldLinkKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wsr_query_ald_media_id = #{wsrQueryAldMediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ag_ald_position_id = #{agAldPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitor_count = #{visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
authuser_count = #{authuserCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
open_count = #{openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_page_count = #{totalPageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
new_comer_count = #{newComerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_stay_time = #{totalStayTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
secondary_avg_stay_time = #{secondaryAvgStayTime,jdbcType=REAL},
one_page_count = #{onePageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bounce_rate = #{bounceRate,jdbcType=REAL},
new_people_ratio = #{newPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL},
authuser_people_ratio = #{authuserPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update aldstat_daily_link_monitor set app_key = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day = #{day,jdbcType=DATE}, hour = #{hour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsr_query_ald_link_key = #{wsrQueryAldLinkKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsr_query_ald_media_id = #{wsrQueryAldMediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ag_ald_position_id = #{agAldPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitor_count = #{visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, authuser_count = #{authuserCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_count = #{openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_page_count = #{totalPageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, new_comer_count = #{newComerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_stay_time = #{totalStayTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, secondary_avg_stay_time = #{secondaryAvgStayTime,jdbcType=REAL}, one_page_count = #{onePageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bounce_rate = #{bounceRate,jdbcType=REAL}, new_people_ratio = #{newPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, authuser_people_ratio = #{authuserPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
